description: A creamy warm chicken curry with minimal spices, so an easy meal for all.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Coconut Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Oil your pot and fry your bacon until crisp and fat is rendered. Remove from the pot leaving a little bit of oil
Saute your onions and garlic then add your chicken pieces in small batches until evenly browned
Add back bacon and mix in your coconut cream and chicken stock slowly. Leave to simmer for 10 minutes
Add your sliced capsicum and spinach and leave for a further 15 minutes.
Add turmeric to colour your curry to your preference in small amounts. Serve with steamed rich
